node.detail_zh: 患者屬廣華醫院 E7 病房群組，無外遊紀錄，8 月 15 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient is part of the cluster involved medical ward E7 in Kwong Wah Hospital, has no travel history and developed symptoms on August 15.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: In-hospital infections at Kwong Wah Hospital
groups.description_zh: 在 7 月 22 日至 8 月 9 日間有 6 名病人相繼確診，涉及三間病房。群組首名確診者最先於 7 月 22 日發病，初步相信該患者不合作，常除下口罩「大聲說話、鬧人」，過程中噴出帶病毒的空氣微粒，及群組其他患者轉房而引致引播。群組首 6 名患者已涉及 4 代傳播。
groups.description_en: Six patients from three wards at Kwong Wah Hospital were diagnosed positive for the virus between July 22 and August 9. The patient of the first confirmed case developed symptoms on July 22, who reportedly frequently 'talked loudly and told off people' with the mask off. It is believed that the virus-carrying air particles he emitted caused further spreading through patients being transferred to other wards. A fourth-degree transmission is identified within the first six confirmed cases.
